GUIDE_VIDEO_1:
Driver: Carsten Oberscheid
Corner guides in subtitles![youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VSQqBQufvhk[/youtube]
PREAMBLE:
This week we travel to the famous 'Green Hell' - Nurburgring Nordschleife. This is the industriefahrten layout - i.e. NOT including the GP track.
[size=18][color=red][b]IMPORTANT NOTES THIS WEEK[/b][/color][/size]
	- There are [b]separate qualifying sessions[/b] (starting 15 minutes past each hour), not the normal attached qualifying!
	- The track takes a LONG time to load on most PCs - be aware of this and join the race session in plenty of time!
	- We only have 3 laps in the race - survival is paramount because a tow back to the pits will basically end your race. Concentrate on being clean and safe and you will get a good result.
	- Static weather for all sessions this week - no need to worry about track temperature :)
TRACK_NOTES:
Here's a turn-by-turn guide I wrote for myself last time we ran here: [url]https://gist.github.com/pwallington/7ec44ed5e9422ebf4b8a17530db6d92c[/url].

Some important general notes:
       - There are not many overtaking opportunities early on in the lap - especially on lap 1, BE PATIENT and you will have plenty of chances later on.
       - The SRF really doesn't like the kerbs, especially on the exits of corners - be careful!
       - The relatively low power of the SRF makes many of the faster corners easy flat-out or with a small lift
